Uses of Class
app.Opus

  • Packages that use Opus 
    Package Description
    app  

    • Uses of Opus in app

      Fields in app with type parameters of type Opus 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Opus> Store.documentStore 
      Methods in app that return Opus 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Opus SourceProcessor.extractOpus(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author)
      Extracts an Opus from a file and adds it to the Document Store.
      Opus SourceProcessor.removeOpus(int opusIndex)
      Removes the specified Opus from the documentStore, updates all of the ordinal numbers of the affected Opuses within the documentStore, reserializes the updated documentStore, and updates the inverted index to match the updated documentStore.
      Methods in app that return types with arguments of type Opus 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Opus> SourceProcessor.getDocumentStore()
      Getter method for documentStore.
      Methods in app with parameters of type Opus 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Indexer.addTerms(Opus opus)
      Add the terms from the Opus (described by the given Opus number) to the index.
      void Indexer.removeTerms(Opus opus)
      Remove the terms from the Opus (described by the given Opus number) from the index.
